title: PPE Kit Detection System
description: An AI-based system that detects PPE (Personal Protective Equipment) such as helmets and vests using YOLOv8 and OpenCV to ensure workplace safety.

title: Job Role Prediction Web App
description: A machine learning-based web application that predicts the most suitable job role for users based on their skills and educational background.

title: AI-powered Resume Analyzer
description: An AI-powered tool that analyzes resumes, extracts key information, and evaluates candidates based on skill relevance using NLP and Machine Learning.

title: Book Recommender System
description: A book recommendation system built using machine learning techniques to suggest books based on user interests.

title: My Portfolio
description: A personal portfolio website showcasing my projects, experience, and skills, built using React JS and modern UI design principles.

title: Weather App
description: A weather forecast app that displays real-time temperature, humidity, and conditions using API integration.

title: Calculator
description: A simple and responsive calculator built using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript for performing basic arithmetic operations.

title: Tic-tac-toe
description: A classic Tic-tac-toe game built using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript that allows two players to compete interactively.

title: Password Generator
description: A secure password generator that creates strong, random passwords with user-defined parameters.
